notes: It's part of the final battle of the [[Grave Danger Quest]].
name: The Red Knight
strategy: The Red Knight does not take any direct damage from players since its immune to all elements but [[Drown Damage]]. To kill it, you must kill the [[Vampiric Blood]]s near the boss. The vampires explode dealing Drown Damage which will damage The Red Knight. The players can use [[Diving Equipment]] to avoid this damage.
